summary.para: Values that indicate how the pipeline interprets vertex data that is bound to the input-assembler stage. These primitive topology values determine how the vertex data is rendered on screen.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_UNDEFINED
member.summary: The IA stage has not been initialized with a primitive topology. The IA stage will not function properly unless a primitive topology is defined.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_POINTLIST
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a list of points.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINELIST
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a list of lines.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINESTRIP
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a line strip.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLELIST
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a list of triangles.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLESTRIP
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a triangle strip.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINELIST_ADJ
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a list of lines with adjacency data.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_LINESTRIP_ADJ
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a line strip with adjacency data.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLELIST_ADJ
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a list of triangles with adjacency data.

member.name: D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY.D3D_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLESTRIP_ADJ
member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a triangle strip with adjacency data.

member.summary: Interpret the vertex data as a patch list.
